attributes.action: Stop the cuts to funding for education in Denbighshire
attributes.additional_details: Every single child will be affected. Cuts to the budget means all of our children will receive less support, less provision and less opportunities. Our children will lose their pastoral care, well-being support, behaviour support, mental health support, learning support and access to enriching extra curricular activities and opportunities.
attributes.background: Stop the cuts to education and give our children the support they need!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about education in Denbighshire are a matter for your relevant council, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council directly. You can find your local council by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-local-council
